law.catch_line: State highway engineer to provide cost estimate for any project that legislator desires in six year road plan.
law.text: The state highway engineer shall provide a cost estimate for any project that a member of the General Assembly desires to be considered for advancement or inclusion in the six (6) year road plan.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 21, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 17, effective June 21, 2001. -- Amended 1998 Ky.
